issue.title: How to select world when using ./run_docker_compose.sh

content.raw:
Yes, same result using docker-compose up

developer@6d91608d480b:~/subt\_solution$ rostopic hz /X2/imu/data  
subscribed to \[/X2/imu/data\]  
WARNING: may be using simulated time  
no new messages  
no new messages  
no new messages

‌

developer@6d91608d480b:~/subt\_solution$ rostopic info /X2/imu/data  
Type: sensor\_msgs/Imu

Publishers:

* /X2/ros1\_ign\_bridge\_imu \([http://162aa693cfec:45953/\)](http://162aa693cfec:45953/))

Subscribers: None
